t: Check out this Amazon review of Skidger Gardening Tool
s: The quality of the Skidger is great--stronger built than I expected. I use it in my gardening and I'll expect to use it for 30 years before I wear it out. Its a great tool for grooming around plants and vegetables. I recommend this tool over a hoe.
